Name: Ghost Dimension
About the game: Collect, teleport, become a ghost and beat another level within the same world. Can you do this job? FEATURES ● More than 125 hand craft levels for you to BEAT and be the BEST. ● Explore more than 20 different worlds with specific challenges for each one. ● Teleport and accelerate when necessary, but be careful not to crash. ● Super-rigid control schemes designed for controllers and also keyboards. ● Exclusive soundtrack composed by the developer himself. ● Deep story told by poems.
